concept.title: ECC header file
concept.shortdesc: For elliptic curve cryptography (ECC), ships the ec_curves.h header file. This file defines the curves known by .

conbody.p: View an excerpt of the ec_curves.h file.
conbody.note: Whether a curve is actually supported by depends on the utilized token and on the available hardware.
conbody.p: The selection of curves supported by the depends on the installed version of .
